alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 11:15AM EST until February 20 at 10:16PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... West Virginia... Ohio River At Belleville Lock affecting Meigs, Wood and Jackson Counties. For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ohio River At Belleville Lock. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Ohio State Route 124 is flooded north of Stiversville Road, at Rock Run, at Wells Run to Smith Ridge to Dewitts Run, at Forked Run, at Curtis Hollow Road and between Long Bottom and Shade River. Ohio State Route 124 near the Washington and Meigs County line is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 35.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM EST Sunday was 36.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage late this evening and will continue to fall overnight. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.6 feet on 03/03/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM EST.
